mapper.sql: S_BATCH_NUMBER, S_DEVICE_CODE, N_TIMES, N_PROCESS, S_PROCESS_NAME, N_OPERATION_STEPS, S_DEVICE_NAME, S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME, S_PRODUCT_NAME, TM_BW2_STA, N_SW2_MIN, TM_HEAT_STOP, S_ZCG_CODE, TM_CY_STA, TM_CY_END, F_YY_QTY, F_YY_TOTAL_QTY, S_ZLYSJG_CODE, F_ZLY_VOL, F_ZLY_TOTAL_VOL, S_OPERATOR, S_CHECKER, S_OPERATOR_CLASSES, S_CHECKER_CLASSES, TM_OPERATOR, TM_CHECKER
mapper.select: select * from ${tableName} where (S_BATCH_NUMBER >= ${minBatchNo} or S_BATCH_NUMBER = ${minBatchNo}) and (S_BATCH_NUMBER <= ${maxBatchNo} or S_BATCH_NUMBER = ${minBatchNo} )order by S_BATCH_NUMBER

select * from ${tableName} where (S_BATCH_NUMBER >= ${minBatchNo} or S_BATCH_NUMBER = ${minBatchNo}) and (S_BATCH_NUMBER <= ${maxBatchNo} or S_BATCH_NUMBER = ${minBatchNo} ) S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName} order by S_BATCH_NUMBER
mapper.insert: insert into KY_JYHTQ_CY (S_BATCH_NUMBER, S_DEVICE_CODE, N_TIMES, N_PROCESS, S_PROCESS_NAME, N_OPERATION_STEPS, S_DEVICE_NAME, S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME, S_PRODUCT_NAME, TM_BW2_STA, N_SW2_MIN, TM_HEAT_STOP, S_ZCG_CODE, TM_CY_STA, TM_CY_END, F_YY_QTY, F_YY_TOTAL_QTY, S_ZLYSJG_CODE, F_ZLY_VOL, F_ZLY_TOTAL_VOL, S_OPERATOR, S_CHECKER, S_OPERATOR_CLASSES, S_CHECKER_CLASSES, TM_OPERATOR, TM_CHECKER) values (#{sBatchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sDeviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nProcess,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sProcessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nOperationSteps,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sDeviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sOperationStepsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmBw2Sta,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nSw2Min,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{tmHeatStop,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sZcgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmCySta,jdbcType=DATE}, #{tmCyEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fYyQty,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{fYyTotalQty,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{sZlysjgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fZlyVol,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{fZlyTotalVol,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{sOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sChecker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sOperatorClasses,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sCheckerClasses,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmOperator,jdbcType=DATE}, #{tmChecker,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update KY_JYHTQ_CY
N_PROCESS = #{nProcess,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
S_PROCESS_NAME = #{sProcessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
N_OPERATION_STEPS = #{nOperationSteps,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
S_DEVICE_NAME = #{sDeviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME = #{sOperationStepsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{sProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TM_BW2_STA = #{tmBw2Sta,jdbcType=DATE},
N_SW2_MIN = #{nSw2Min,jdbcType=FLOAT},
TM_HEAT_STOP = #{tmHeatStop,jdbcType=DATE},
S_ZCG_CODE = #{sZcgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TM_CY_STA = #{tmCySta,jdbcType=DATE},
TM_CY_END = #{tmCyEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
F_YY_QTY = #{fYyQty,jdbcType=FLOAT},
F_YY_TOTAL_QTY = #{fYyTotalQty,jdbcType=FLOAT},
S_ZLYSJG_CODE = #{sZlysjgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_ZLY_VOL = #{fZlyVol,jdbcType=FLOAT},
F_ZLY_TOTAL_VOL = #{fZlyTotalVol,jdbcType=FLOAT},
S_OPERATOR = #{sOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_CHECKER = #{sChecker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_OPERATOR_CLASSES = #{sOperatorClasses,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_CHECKER_CLASSES = #{sCheckerClasses,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TM_OPERATOR = #{tmOperator,jdbcType=DATE},
TM_CHECKER = #{tmChecker,jdbcType=DATE},
where S_BATCH_NUMBER = #{sBatchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and S_DEVICE_CODE = #{sDeviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and N_TIMES = #{nTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update KY_JYHTQ_CY set N_PROCESS = #{nProcess,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, S_PROCESS_NAME = #{sProcessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_OPERATION_STEPS = #{nOperationSteps,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, S_DEVICE_NAME = #{sDeviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME = #{sOperationStepsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{sProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TM_BW2_STA = #{tmBw2Sta,jdbcType=DATE}, N_SW2_MIN = #{nSw2Min,jdbcType=FLOAT}, TM_HEAT_STOP = #{tmHeatStop,jdbcType=DATE}, S_ZCG_CODE = #{sZcgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TM_CY_STA = #{tmCySta,jdbcType=DATE}, TM_CY_END = #{tmCyEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, F_YY_QTY = #{fYyQty,jdbcType=FLOAT}, F_YY_TOTAL_QTY = #{fYyTotalQty,jdbcType=FLOAT}, S_ZLYSJG_CODE = #{sZlysjgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_ZLY_VOL = #{fZlyVol,jdbcType=FLOAT}, F_ZLY_TOTAL_VOL = #{fZlyTotalVol,jdbcType=FLOAT}, S_OPERATOR = #{sOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_CHECKER = #{sChecker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_OPERATOR_CLASSES = #{sOperatorClasses,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_CHECKER_CLASSES = #{sCheckerClasses,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TM_OPERATOR = #{tmOperator,jdbcType=DATE}, TM_CHECKER = #{tmChecker,jdbcType=DATE} where S_BATCH_NUMBER = #{sBatchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and S_DEVICE_CODE = #{sDeviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and N_TIMES = #{nTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
